page.title: 03Transport in Hadleigh
page.content: For many years Hadleigh was a major bottleneck on the main Ipswich - Sudbury road, the position becoming desperate when the bridge over the R. Brett was declared unsafe. The open- ing of the by-pass has changed the whole nature of the town but two problems remain. Station Road,joining a growing estate to the town centre has two dangerous narrow sections without pavements and there have been numerous protest meetings. Benton Street is a narrow street of basically medieval houses and is used by the growing amount of traffic going to the A12,the main London road.It is quite unsuited to this heavy traffic.
